articles.description: Chrissy Teigen opens up about the moment a stranger showed her kindness and respect after pregnancy loss and why so many other women don’t get those moments.
articles.content:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend expected this year to be one of the happiest in their lives, as the parents of two planned to become parents of three in February.
But those plans changed last fall, w… [+3324 chars]
